```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(gapminder)
```
```{r, echo = TRUE}
gap <- gapminder_unfiltered

gap %>%
  group_by(year, country) %>%
  summarise(maxlife = max(lifeExp, na.rm = TRUE)) -> sumdat
```
